howItWorks.title: How it works
howItWorks.subtitle: A simple flow for families and caregivers, with blockchain running quietly in the background.

steps.title: 1. Download and choose a profile
steps.text: Families and caregivers pick their role and follow a tailored onboarding journey.

steps.title: 2. Fast onboarding
steps.text: Essential data and preferences in a clean, human-friendly flow.

steps.title: 3. Secure activation (€25)
steps.text: Activation via Stripe converts euros into tokens and credits the embedded wallet automatically.

steps.title: 4. Wallet always visible
steps.text: Balance and history are shown in plain language, with simple and advanced views.

steps.title: 5. Digital contract (€5 + €5)
steps.text: Each new contract requires €5 from the family and €5 from the caregiver in tokens. Missing tokens? Pay in euros and convert instantly.

steps.title: 6. Blockchain record
steps.text: When accepted, we store a hash and metadata on-chain to ensure integrity and traceability.

steps.title: 7. Payment and commission
steps.text: The platform retains 15% of the contract value to fund growth and support.

steps.title: 8. Tips and bonuses
steps.text: Tips are paid in tokens; caregivers can cash out to euros. Sold tokens are burned to create scarcity.
